thread.title: Mike Posner's Neon Green Hair At The Grammys Is Something
thread.title_full: Mike Posner's Neon Green Hair At The Grammys Is Something

author: Lauren Yapalater
title: Mike Posner's Neon Green Hair At The Grammys Is Something
text:
View this image ›
E! ID: 10514279 2. He used to look like this: View this image ›
Noam Galai / Getty Images ID: 10514312 3. But now he looks like this. View this image ›
E! ID: 10514280 4. He has neon green hair and one hoop earring. View this image ›
E! ID: 10514282 5. Bleached eyebrows. View this image ›
E! ID: 10514440 6. And one hoop earring. View this image ›
E! ID: 10514442 7. It’s a look. View this image ›
E! / Twitter: @JarettSays ID: 10514281 8. In addition to the new hair, Posner also debuted a new style of conversation. Which was literally not answering interview questions directly, and instead talking through the other guy by whispering in his ear. View this image ›
E! ID: 10514369 9. So anyway, that happened, and then this happened: View this image ›
E! ID: 10514422 10. Basically this tweet sums it all up pretty well: mike posner dyed his hair neon green and is only talking to press through whispering to blackbear what kind of pill did he take in ibiza
— soph (@greylovxto) ID: 10514339 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
